column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Not a lot to say about this place that hasn't been said
column2: but this is easily the most technically perfect baking in Houston
column3: and one of the better places I've ever been.  Their breakfast torta was the breakfast torta champion of Dunlavy (sorry Guadalupana...)
column4: but for some reason they stopped serving it.  I would definitely recommend this place to anyone
column5: but weekdays tend to better to avoid the ever-increasing crowds.
